doc.previous: Libre licences are licences pertaining to copyright in which the copyright owner has granted the freedoms specified in the definition of libre software and definitions derived from it such as the Definition of Free Cultural Works g A libre resource one so licensed or in the public domain is free of any restrictions which might prevent users from being able to exercise these freedoms such as DRM or patent encumbrance d For example of the still active Creative Commons licences Creative Commons Attribution Attribution ShareAlike and Zero are libre licences
